tool_description:
Mantiks provide an easy and fast access to all companies and job information from Glassdoor job board.

Retrieve job postings in real time from Glassdoor with the important meta data as job title, job description, job publication date...
name: glassdoor
title: glassdoor

api_list.name: Job details

required_parameters.name: job_id
required_parameters.description: Use Jobs Search endpoint to retrieve IDs

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://glassdoor.p.rapidapi.com/job/1007142068313"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "glassdoor.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://glassdoor.p.rapidapi.com/job/{job_id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "glassdoor.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Company details

required_parameters.name: company_id

api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://glassdoor.p.rapidapi.com/company/{company_id}"

headers = {

api_list.name: Locations Search
api_list.description: Search a city / country / state to retrieve location_id / location_type.  Useful for jobs search

api_list.name: Companies Search
Jobs Search
api_list.description: Search jobs with by keyword and location.

required_parameters.name: location_id
required_parameters.description: Glassdoor's locations are represented by ID/Type. Those tuple could be found we a locations search (see relation endpoint)

required_parameters.name: location_type
required_parameters.description:
Glassdoor's locations are represented by ID/Type. Those tuple could be found we a locations search (see relation endpoint). Here is the meaning of each value
C: CITY
N: \\\"COUNTRY
M: METRO
S: STATE

required_parameters.name: keyword
required_parameters.description: Keyword used to search jobs, could be job title or any specific word

optional_parameters.name: page_cursor
optional_parameters.description: For all page_id greater than 1, you need to specify this parameter. Each page provide the page_cursor of the next page_id in its payload

optional_parameters.name: page_id
optional_parameters.description: Default page_id is 0 (first page). Each page return at most 30 jobs. You need to specify the page_cursor for all page greater than 1
